DataElement.preferredName: Patient Missed Dose Food Drink Near Time Dose Due Reason Data Unknown Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A single character text field to indicate if the patient missed doses for the reason of had food or drink near the time the dose was due.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Missed Dose Food Drink Near Time Dose Due Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A dose of medicine that was not taken at the prescribed dosing interval._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A group of materials of either plant, animal or artificial origin containing essential body nutrients that can be ingested by an organism to produce energy, stimulate growth, and maintain life._A single serving of a beverage; any liquid suitable for drinking._Not far distant in time or space or degree or circumstances._The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._Expected or scheduled._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A dose of medicine that was not taken at the prescribed dosing interval.:A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Concepts.definition: A dose of medicine that was not taken at the prescribed dosing interval.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Food Drink Near Time Dose Due Reason

Concepts.definition: A group of materials of either plant, animal or artificial origin containing essential body nutrients that can be ingested by an organism to produce energy, stimulate growth, and maintain life.
A single serving of a beverage; any liquid suitable for drinking.
Not far distant in time or space or degree or circumstances.
The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a single character text field to record data.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
